comments.content: We do not erase accounts because that would disrupt the flow of dialogue in the threads in which you participated. Why do you want to erase your account?
The internet is forever and always. ;0)

Why would anyone want to erase their account?

If you wrote something you didn’t like, you can edit it... and if you added something useful, it would be sad to see it gone...
